sentences.en: I feel really confused and wretched.
sentences.cn: 我觉得十分迷惘，难过极了。

sentences.en: I was shocked to see their wretched living conditions.
sentences.cn: 看到他们恶劣的生活条件我很震惊。

sentences.en: Lao Zhang feels very wretched because his illness isn't getting any better.
sentences.cn: 老张因为病老不好,心里很别扭.

sentences.en: Life on a desert island is wretched.
sentences.cn: 荒岛上的生活是令人感到悲惨的.

sentences.en: Please excuse this wretched apology for a meal.
sentences.cn: 请包涵这顿不像样的饭菜.

sentences.en: The more he thought, however, the more wretched his situation became.
sentences.cn: 可是, 他越想越觉得自己的处境不妙.

sentences.en: The pay has always been wretched.
Theft is something that really disgusts me. It makes me feel hateful towards this whole wretched island.
sentences.cn: 偷窃是让我深恶痛绝的事情，它让我对这整个该死的岛都充满仇视。

sentences.en: This wretched war has brought misery to millions.
sentences.cn: 这场悲惨的战争为无数人带来了不幸。

sentences.en: We have sorted out this wretched business at last.
sentences.cn: 我们最终还是把这件破事儿理顺了。

sentences.en: What a wretched existence the people in the slum lead!
sentences.cn: 这个贫民窟里的人们过着多么令人悲惨的生活啊!

sentences.en: What a wretched existence these people lead in the slums!
sentences.cn: 住在贫民窟里的这些人生活多可怜 呀 !

sentences.en: What a wretched life they lived in the workhouse!
sentences.cn: 他们在济贫院里过的生活真悲惨!
那个可恶的男孩在哪里？

sentences.en: You have built up a huge property empire by buying from wretched people who had to sell or starve.
sentences.cn: 你靠从那些不卖房就得挨饿的可怜人手里买下房子后建立起了庞大的房产帝国。
你看起来愁眉苦脸的，怎么啦？

words.tran_cn: 可怜的人，不幸的人；卑鄙的人
可怜的,可鄙的,艰难的,不幸的,悲惨的

trans.tran_cn: 可怜的，讨厌的，苦恼的，难过的，恶劣的
trans.tran_en: someone who is wretched is very unhappy or ill, and you feel sorry for them
